transactionIdentification.description: Provides details about unique transaction identification known by the participant

clearingMemberIdentificationId.description: Clearing member identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

clearingMemberIdentificationCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode

participantIdentificationId.description: Participant identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

participantIdentificationCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode

accountIdentificationId.description: Account identifier defined by the participant

collateralCoverageType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCollateralCoverageTypeCode

totalValueOfCollateral.description: Total value of the collateral (post-haircut) held by the exposed party

riskWithoutCollateral.description: Risk Exposure without collaterals at EoD

additionalMargin.description: Additional Margin based on positions limit

collateralBalance.description: Remaining value (positive value) or debit (negative value) of collateral

informationType.description: Information regarding the party collateral position
informationType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalInformationTypeCode

officialTotalMarginAmount.description: Summation of IM and Additional Margin calculated for Margin Account

officialTotalMarginCurrency.description: Currency code for official total margin
officialTotalMarginCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

officialInitialMarginAmount.description: Initial Margin calculated for Margin Account

officialInitialMarginCurrency.description: Currency code for official initial margin
officialInitialMarginCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

officialTotalAMAmount.description: Summation of all the Additional Margins calculated for Margin Account except for Concentration Position Limit

officialTotalAMCurrency.description: Currency code for official total AM
officialTotalAMCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

officialRealizedVariationMarginAmount.description: Realized Variation Margin calculated for the Margin Account

officialRealizedVariationMarginCurrency.description: Currency code for official realized variation margin
officialRealizedVariationMarginCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

officialNetLiquidityValueAmount.description: Net Liquidating value for the Margin Account

officialNetLiquidityValueCurrency.description: Currency code for official net liquidity value
officialNetLiquidityValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

intradayTotalMarginAmount.description: Summation of IM and Additional Margin calculated for Margin Account (intraday)

intradayTotalMarginCurrency.description: Currency code for intraday total margin
intradayTotalMarginCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

intradayInitialMarginAmount.description: Initial Margin calculated for Margin Account (intraday)

intradayInitialMarginCurrency.description: Currency code for intraday initial margin
intradayInitialMarginCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

intradayTotalAMAmount.description: Summation of all the Additional Margins calculated for Margin Account except for Concentration Position Limit (intraday)

intradayTotalAMCurrency.description: Currency code for intraday total AM
intradayTotalAMCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

intradayRealizedVariationMarginAmount.description: Realized Variation Margin calculated for the Margin Account (intraday)

intradayRealizedVariationMarginCurrency.description: Currency code for intraday realized variation margin
intradayRealizedVariationMarginCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

intradayNetLiquidityValueAmount.description: Net Liquidating value for the Margin Account (intraday)

intradayNetLiquidityValueCurrency.description: Currency code for intraday net liquidity value
intradayNetLiquidityValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

intradayRiskLimitAssigned.description: This block contains the value of the intraday risk limit determined by the responsible in the chain of responsibility

riskWithoutCollateralIntraday.description: Risk Exposure without collaterals at EoD (intraday)
